Name: Zoning, Herkimer-Williams, Brooklyn (C 250288 PCK)
Title: Application number C 250288 PCK (Herkimer-Williams) submitted by the Department of Citywide Administrative Services and the Economic Development Corporation, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for a site selection and acquisition of property for use as a publicly accessible open space located at Block 1555, Lot 19, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 5, Council District 37.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
